Description_lang: Imperator Mar'gok marks a player with chaotic magic. After $d the magic explodes, inflicting $158609s1 Arcane damage to their allies within $158609A1 yards.Replication: Conjures 8 Orbs of Chaos that move out from the wearer when Mark of Chaos expires. Each orb inflicts $158648s1 Arcane damage to all players that they move through.
AuraDescription_lang: Inflicts Arcane damage to nearby allies after $d.
